What are the treatments for methylmalonic acidemia with homocystinuria ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of methylmalonic acidemia with homocystinuria:  - Baby's First Test: Methylmalonic Acidemia with Homocystinuria  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Disorders of Intracellular Cobalamin Metabolism  - Genetic Testing Regist
